attributes.action: Organisations & Institutions in receipt of Public Funds to fly the Union Jack.
attributes.background:
Legislate in favour of requiring all Organisations & Institutions in receipt of Public Funds to fly the Union Jack.
This will help generate public awareness in regards to where some of our money is spent, will help to promote cohesiveness within society and improve patriotism in all communities.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for deciding on flags for private organisations or institutions.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563467
